articles.title: Now Ozempic patients say they're going BALD while on fat-loss shot - Daily Mail
articles.description: Patients taking Ozempic and Wegovy say their hair is starting to fall out. Doctors in the US are not clear on what is causing the side effect, but say that it has been linked to rapid weight loss.
